title: "Tales of the Grim Sleeper" Companion Podcast
description:
Sponsor Content: In this official companion podcast to the HBO Documentary film Tales of the Grim Sleeper, host Hugo Lindgren talks with the documentary’s director Nick Broomfield.
Tales of the Grim Sleeper premieres Monday, April 27 at 9 pm eastern on HBO and HBO NOW.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
